content.text:
Based on my analysis, I've identified several critical issues preventing the site from running properly:

## Issues Found:

1. **Type Mismatch in Hero Component**: The Hero component expects `cta.links` to be an array, but the props data provides `cta` as an array of objects where each object contains a `links` array.

2. **Missing Router Setup**: The components use `Link` and `NavLink` from `react-router-dom` but there's no router wrapper in the main App component.

3. **Header Component Navigation Issue**: Header component expects `navigation[0].links` but the data structure might not guarantee this exists.

4. **CSS Issues**: The components reference custom CSS classes like `brand-1`, `brand-5`, `brand-6` that aren't defined in the index.css file.

5. **Missing Static Assets**: References to images like `/api/placeholder/1200/600` and `/og-image.png` that likely don't exist.

input.plan:
## Fix Site Runtime Issues

**Type and Data Structure Fixes:**
1. Fix Hero component data structure mismatch - update Hero component to handle `cta` array properly
2. Add null safety checks to Header component for navigation array access
3. Update component interfaces to match actual data structure in props.ts

**Router Setup:**
4. Wrap App component with React Router's BrowserRouter to enable routing functionality
5. Convert external links to proper routing or external link handling

**Styling Fixes:**
6. Define missing CSS custom properties for brand colors (brand-1, brand-5, brand-6) in index.css
7. Add fallback styles or replace with standard Tailwind/DaisyUI classes

**Asset Management:**
8. Replace placeholder image URLs with proper static assets or remove references
9. Add missing favicon and og-image files to public directory

**Testing:**
10. Run development server and verify all components render without errors
11. Test navigation functionality and responsive design

content.text:
## Site Debugging Complete ✅

I've successfully debugged and fixed all the critical issues preventing the site from running:

1. **Fixed Hero component data structure mismatch** - Updated interface and component to handle `cta` as an array
2. **Added null safety checks to Header component** - Prevented navigation array access errors
3. **Added React Router setup** - Wrapped App with BrowserRouter to enable routing
4. **Defined missing CSS brand variables** - Added brand color classes using Tailwind utilities
5. **Fixed placeholder image URLs** - Replaced with valid SVG data URL placeholder
6. **Tested successfully** - Both dev server and build process work without errors

The site is now running properly at `http://localhost:5173/` without any runtime errors. The TypeScript compilation is clean and all components render correctly.

    59→Wills and trusts made easy.Wills and trusts made easy.
    60→![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/2af68cd7-c864-437a-9148-1fae4248531f/Family%20inside%202.jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25/rs=h:500,cg:true)

    66→![Image is of an elderly woman in consultation](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/stock/4089/:/cr=t:12.53%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:74.93%25/rs=w:388,h:194,cg:true)
    67→Start planning your estate with a free initial consultation with Emily. You don't need to prepare or bring anything. We'll have a conversation to discuss your needs, answer questions, and help you establish your estate planning goals.

    78→A Last Will & Testament provides instructions to the probate court indicating your exact wishes about who will care for your children, who is in charge of implementing your wishes (your executor) and how your assets will be distributed. Your will and all other documents filed with the probate court will be public record. 
    79→[View Pricing & Documents](https://kirkestateplanning.com/wills)
    80→#### Trust Package
    81→#### Trust Package
    82→![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/2af68cd7-c864-437a-9148-1fae4248531f/b909a9fe-e535-4b1b-85ba-5b1f6c6dce30.jpg/:/rs=w:388,h:194,cg:true,m/cr=w:388,h:194)
    83→A Revocable Trust accomplishes everything that a will does, but with the significant advantage of avoiding the probate process. “Revocable” means that you retain control over your finances, possessions, and wishes. At any time during your life, you can change or even revoke your Revocable Trust. 
    84→[View Pricing & Documents](https://kirkestateplanning.com/trusts)
    85→##  Emily Kirk

    88→I grew up in central Illinois and have lived in St. Louis since the early 1990s. I graduated from the Washington University School of Law in St. Louis and practice law in Missouri and Illinois. I practiced business litigation for several years and also spent a decade working in higher education. My husband and I enjoy participating in local trivia nights and spending time with our two children.
    89→#### Estate Planning
    90→I was trained in estate planning by a prestigious, nationally-recognized law firm and found that it was an area of practice that I loved. I have helped hundreds of clients with their wills, trusts, and estate planning needs.
    91→#### Focus
    92→I enjoy working with estate planning clients because of the positive outcomes and the peace of mind that clients experience when it's all done. It is the most rewarding work of my career. That's why it's all I do.

##  Emily Kirk
* * *
#### Background and Qualifications
I grew up in central Illinois and have lived in St. Louis since the early 1990s. I graduated from the Washington University School of Law in St. Louis and practice law in Missouri and Illinois. I practiced business litigation for several years and also spent a decade working in higher education. My husband and I enjoy participating in local trivia nights and spending time with our two children.
#### Estate Planning
I was trained in estate planning by a prestigious, nationally-recognized law firm and found that it was an area of practice that I loved. I have helped hundreds of clients with their wills, trusts, and estate planning needs.
#### Focus
I enjoy working with estate planning clients because of the positive outcomes and the peace of mind that clients experience when it's all done. It is the most rewarding work of my career. That's why it's all I do.

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import SEOHead from '../components/SEOHead'; import { headerProps, footerProps } from '../data/props'; const Trusts: React.FC = () => { return (

Trust Package

Advanced estate planning with a Revocable Trust

What Is a Revocable Trust?

A Revocable Trust accomplishes everything that a will does, but with the significant advantage of avoiding the probate process.

"Revocable" means that you retain control over your finances, possessions, and wishes. At any time during your life, you can change or even revoke your Revocable Trust.

Trust Advantages

  • Avoids probate court process
  • Maintains privacy (not public record)
  • Faster distribution to beneficiaries
  • Reduces court costs and fees
  • You retain full control during lifetime
  • Can be modified or revoked anytime

Trust vs. Will

Privacy

Trust remains private, while will becomes public record

Speed

Trust avoids lengthy probate process

Costs

Trust eliminates probate court fees and delays

Control

Both allow you to maintain control during your lifetime

Trust Package Includes

Revocable Trust Document

Comprehensive trust agreement tailored to your needs

Pour-Over Will

Backup will to handle any assets not in the trust

Financial Power of Attorney

Designate someone to handle financial matters if needed

Healthcare Directives

Medical decision-making authority and end-of-life wishes

Funding Guidance

Instructions for transferring assets into the trust

Ongoing Support

Guidance for trust administration and modifications

Is a Trust Right for You?

Schedule a free consultation to discuss whether a trust or will package best meets your estate planning goals.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649

Compare with Will Package
